categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Xak Herral was a Human male soldier in the Eighty-third Platoon who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. Stationed on Balmorra, he went on a mission to return a high-security Imperial data card to the Vanguard Outpost until he was killed by Republic forces. After his death, Captain Labe tasked an Imperial spacer to recover the stolen data card from the northern Markaran Plains.
